name: meteor-mash
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.
